name: URoRRuR'R'R's Bantha
Lore: 'Raised by RR''uruurr for personal use by URoRRuR''R''R. Alpha male of his bantha herd. Has trampled many Jawas. Nicknamed ''Rrr''ur''R.',
Text: 'May add 2 ''riders'' (passengers). Ability = 1/2. Adds 1 to power of each of your Tusken Raiders and other banthas present. When ridden by URoRRuR''R''R, adds one battle destiny.',
